backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact messages in a growable array with functions to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two scene-labeling features with their related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files, their roles, and functionality across the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining backend deploy, frontend build, and runtime validation steps plus diagnostic format.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Guide for embedding the static 3D café build into WordPress via Elementor, including installation, features, and limitations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring viewport setup, 3D scene canvas, top navigation, and menu panel overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: Reusable styled container adding contour texture background and rounded framed layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Panel wrapper providing title bar, close button, scrollable content area, and contour frame styling.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button with tooltip that triggers the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo and a menu button that opens the menu panel.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Dialog explaining movement, gaze, proximity, and interaction tips for first‑time users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport height and updates a CSS variable to stabilize mobile layout against browser chrome changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Manages a first‑visit flag using localStorage and provides functions to dismiss or show onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and status handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages with validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles configuring Tailwind layers, color variables, viewport behavior, safe areas, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: A right‑side sheet panel showing informational content about the cafe with icons and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: A right‑side panel with a contact form that submits messages and displays contact info using React Query and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: A right-side sheet panel offering a downloadable WordPress static package with instructions and feature notes.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: A tabbed menu panel displaying coffee, pastry, and dessert items using a right-side sheet UI.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Defines the 3D cafe scene with lighting, a basic room fallback, navigation, and error handling hooks.
frontend/src/scene/components/WallFrameL: Renders 3D text on a plane using a canvas-generated texture with customizable size and styling.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Implements keyboard and pointer-based first-person navigation with touch support and pointer lock integration.
frontend/src/scene/environment/BasicCafe: Provides a minimal fallback café scene with simple floor, walls, ceiling, furniture, contour overlays, and an espresso machine to ensure immediate rendering.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Defines the full café environment with physics floor, textured walls, contour‑styled ceiling, furniture arrangement, and mount logging.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Implements reusable 3D café furniture components including a counter, table, and wooden chair with optional contour textures.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds countertop props, espresso machine, pastry case, napkin holder, and menu board with contour‑textured elements.
frontend/src/scene/environment/Commercia: Renders a detailed commercial espresso machine model with group heads, steam wands, and metal materials.
frontend/src/scene/HomeCafeCanvas.tsx: Wraps the Three.js canvas with loading, error handling, WebGL checks, and responsive camera settings.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useContourTextu: Loads a high‑contrast contour texture and generates configured variants for floors, walls, and furniture.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useNonBlockingT: Loads textures asynchronously without blocking rendering, reporting success or failure through diagnostics.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useSceneStartup: Hook that triggers a timeout callback if a scene doesn't render in time and provides a cancel method upon successful render.
frontend/src/scene/hooks/useWallMapTextu: Loads and configures a repeating wall map texture with filtering and anisotropy settings.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Animates a door opening based on camera proximity and smoothly interpolates rotation each frame.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Interactive prop that can be clicked and dragged to rotate, showing a tooltip while inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Empty placeholder file for interaction management.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Floating interactive prop with hover/press feedback and multiple visual variants such as card, cup, or sign.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Displays point‑of‑interest markers with hover, dwell detection, and activation actions tied to camera direction.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Registry of POIs defining id, label, position, action, and highlight color.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Detects when the camera enters predefined zones and shows an overlay with an action button.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Empty placeholder for scene panel props.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Exports helpers to create contour, wood, metal, and overlay materials plus contour color constants.
frontend/src/scene/SceneErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that captures scene render errors and resets on retry.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneDegradedOverl: Overlay UI shown when full scene fails to load, offering a retry option and explanation.
Error overlay displaying failure details, optional diagnostics, and a retry button.
frontend/src/scene/ui/SceneLoadingOverla: React overlay showing a loading spinner and, after a delay, a degraded state with retry support.
frontend/src/scene/utils/sceneDiagnostic: Utilities for logging scene loading/rendering failures and successes with labeled diagnostic stages.
frontend/src/scene/utils/webglSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL availability and required extensions, returning support status and reason.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store tracking which UI overlay panel is active.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines easing, durations, and spring presets plus a helper for building transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Centralized design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Standardized deployment error logger providing context and remediation hints for build/runtime issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests.
